translations: n.胸罩；汽车保险罩（bra的复数）

phrs.translation: 硅胶胸垫；自粘式硅胶胸罩

sentences.sentence: Who said bras are only for women?
sentences.translation: 谁说只有女人能穿文胸？

sentences.sentence: Forget white bras forever - no more!
sentences.translation: 永远忘记白色文胸吧——别再穿它了！

sentences.sentence: A survey says British women own, on average, 16 bras at any one time.
sentences.translation: 一项调查显示，在任何时候，英国女性都平均拥有16个文胸。
